name: Tutorial 1: Git and Visual Studio Code
description: This is our first tutorial of the semester! We will be introducing Git and Visual Studio Code by creating an animated display of club members.

name: Tutorial 2: HTML and CSS
description: This tutorial introduces the languages used in sites across the web. It walks through the creation of a static webpage from scratch.

name: Tutorial 3: Javascript
description: Our third tutorial introduced you to the scripting language of the web. It walks through the creation of a dynamic webpage.

name: Tutorial 4: Node.js and npm
description: This tutorial introduces Node.js and npm.

name: Tutorial 5: Express and MongoDB/mongoose
description: This tutorial introduces a web framework and database management system to help create the backend of a web application

name: Tutorial 6: React and JSX
description: This tutorial introduces a popular javascript libary used to build user interfaces

name: Stub Tutorial 7: Multiplayer Game (Work in Progress)
description: This is a link to the Multiplayer game's Google Doc full of notes. At some future point this will become a tutorial
